ComicInfo.Summary:
Red Shift: Prime: While mugging to a crowd, Prime gets angry with a man who appears to be sneering at him. As Prime approaches him, the man teleports Prime to another universe, then back again.
Red Shift: The Night Man: Night Man looks through a dimensional portal at Hellstorm who gets a little peeved at being spied on.
Red Shift: Siren: At Project Pegasus, Whizzer notices some odd dimensional interruptions and tells Beast all about them.
Red Shift: Mantra: Mantra shares some fast food with Gateway and feels sorry for herself.
Red Shift: Exiles: While worrying about her past, Amber has a premonition about her future with the Phoenix.
Red Shift: Rune: Rune takes a little dimensional jaunt and observes the X-Men at their mansion.
Red Shift: UltraForce: Spider-Man and Thor break into the Ultraverse through a rip in time created by Topaz and Prototype. All that's left behind is a copy of The Daily Bugle, which the Black Knight recognizes from his home world.
Generation X: Red Shift: Jubille reflects on the events of the Phoenix Resurrection.
ComicInfo.Title: Red Shift: Prime; Red Shift: The Night Man; Red Shift: Siren; Red Shift: Mantra; Red Shift: Exiles; Red Shift: Rune; Red Shift: UltraForce; Generation X: Red Shift
ComicInfo.Writer: Ian Edginton,Paul Benjamin,I. Edginton,Dan Abnett,I. Edginton,Ian Edginton,Dan Abnett
